amendment.description: To amend the Standing Rules of the Senate to reform the filibuster rules to improve the daily process of the Senate.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3 proposed by Senator Lee.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3 proposed by Senator Lee.
